entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h early this afternoon except gusting to 50 at times. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 17 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind east 20 km/h except gusting to 50 at times early this evening. Wind becoming light this evening. Temperature rising to minus 10 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of light snow. High minus 9.
